duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and present interior design concepts and plans for client projects, ensuring alignment with project requirements and client vision.
Oversee and coordinate the design process, including space planning, material selection, and furniture procurement to meet project deadlines.
Collaborate with architects, contractors, and clients to ensure seamless implementation of design concepts and resolution of any design challenges.
Manage and mentor junior designers, providing guidance and support in the development of their design skills and project management abilities.
Stay updated on industry trends, materials, and technologies to incorporate innovative design solutions into projects and maintain a competitive edge.
Participate in client presentations, communicate design concepts effectively, and address client feedback to achieve project approval and client satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Interior Design, Architecture, or related field (Master's preferred)
